channel.title: Comments on: Day 3 – The Boss Loves Microsoft…

item.title: By: Sean Burgess
item.dc:creator: Sean Burgess
item.description: <p>And even worse for MS is the fact that even when they do get a company to move to Exchange for mail, the Domino environment lives on for years, if not forever. How can you win a war against a product that you can't get people to stop using even when their managers tell them to start using your product?</p><p>Sean---</p>
item.content:encoded:
And even worse for MS is the fact that even when they do get a company to move to Exchange for mail, the Domino environment lives on for years, if not forever. How can you win a war against a product that you can’t get people to stop using even when their managers tell them to start using your product?

Sean—
